Articles.Content:
A collection of Lego Space logos, formatted for use as KSP flags. Also includes a good number of city/castle/etc logos.

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/222393-lego-space-flags
Nice! I was just reminiscing that I used to build massive fleets of spacecraft in Lego, and now I'm doing the same in KSP.
There will be another update on Friday with more castle/city icons and one or two of the funky alien/insect themed space ones I need to edit. When I'm done, it should have all the lego logos/icons.
These are great! I was using one I found online a while back but since it was scanned from an old t-shirt I think it was somewhat grainy.
The next update will also have the "generic" space logo on a variety of different color background flags, in addition to the transparent-background version.

I love this pack. I can't believe it wasn't made sooner.

I had nostalgiagasms when I saw the "Space Police" Logos.

Also, I left this in the comments on Curse, but it belongs here too. <3
Just posted my last update for a bit (version 4), large number of additions.
Nostalgiapocalypse!
This mod deserves more attention! It's really filled with nostalgia.
It's got ALL of the lego logos that I'm aware exist, I may add another update at some point if any more interesting lego sets come out.
this seems more like a Fan Works thing than an actual mod... Cool stuff though
Yeah, I wasn't entirely sure where to put it in the forums, but a few other "flag packs" were listed as add-ons so I figured why not lol.
ok, I sent a report asking if this should be moved to another area, I'll let the moderators decide...no offense... I might download these insignias when I get home.
One of those looked like an upside down Triforce.

One of those looked like an upside down Triforce.

That was the original "blacktron" logo
As someone who has been rebuilding all of his old lego sets for the past month, this is an instant install. Thank you!
I will be updating this to host on kerbalstuff in the near future.

Downloading now... right now! (Why was this not a thing before!)

I love this pack. I can't believe it wasn't made sooner.

I had nostalgiagasms when I saw the "Space Police" Logos.

Also, I left this in the comments on Curse, but it belongs here too. <3

http://youtu.be/xYk9q9UBnmg

That clip is me. Soooooo me. It's like they videoed me as a kid just for that film.
HaHa a very funny mod!

I'll be re-uploading this to spacedock in the next week or two - I've been swamped at work and my KSP modding has been on the back burner for the last couple of months, but things are cooling down and I should be able to get back to "work" here.
All my missions get space lego flags.

Cool all the various flags from legos!

BTW, I love Lego's simplified de-trademarked version of the NASA flags.  They clearly designed any of the ones without the NASA trademarks before they secured NASA partnership deal (not a hard task, but loads of red-tape unless they approach you like they did Squad) in order to be close enough while still being under fair use when used for commercial gain.  As a result the flags are beautiful simplified models.

Edited August 1, 2016 by Ruedii
moar details.
